next_steps.title: Sign Up for Stytch
next_steps.description: Create a Stytch account at https://stytch.com and access the dashboard.

next_steps.title: Create a B2B Project
next_steps.description: In the Stytch Dashboard, create a new B2B project to manage your application's authentication.

next_steps.title: Complete the Connected Apps getting started Guide
Test Your Integration
next_steps.description: Run test authentication flows to verify everything works before going live.

next_steps.title: Go Live
next_steps.description: Deploy your application with Stytch authentication and start onboarding users!
